services.title: Our Dental Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive dental care provided by our experienced dental professionals in Makati, Philippines.

crowns.title: Crowns
crowns.description: We offer restoration and enhancement to misshapen, chipped, and damaged teeth. Select from metal, porcelain-infused metal, porcelain, ceramic, and resin crowns, depending on your needs and preferences.

veneers.title: Veneers
veneers.description: In need of a thin new layer to improve or restore the appearance of your tooth? Set an appointment with us and get a consultation, fitting, and installment of veneers for your desired pearly-whites.

rootcanal.title: Endodontics (Root Canal)
rootcanal.description: Arevalo Clinic also specializes in endodontic procedures, from non-surgical root canals to endodontic treatments. See a specialist at our clinic and we'll see what we can do to save your tooth.

bonding.title: Bonds
bonding.description: Arrange a single-session dental bonding procedure with us and have gaps between teeth filled out, repair a chipped tooth, and generally improve the condition of a tooth in one sitting.

bridges.title: Bridges
bridges.description: Replace missing teeth and ease biting difficulty with dental bridges. Call the clinic for a consultation and scheduling for the smile restoring procedure.

whitening.title: Teeth Whitening
whitening.description: Get back the confidence to flash your biggest smile with our tooth whitening services, from brushing and natural bleaching, to bleaching gel and laser bleaching.

orthodontic.title: Orthodontic Treatment
orthodontic.description: For those with concerns of malocclusion (overbites and underbites), and the proper positioning and alignment of their teeth and jaws, we offer orthodontic services to help eliminate discomfort and difficulty as well as to improve one's overall facial appearance.

implants.title: Implants
implants.description: Bridges and dentures are not the only solutions to missing teeth. Dental implants are very much possible today, too, and Arevalo Dental Clinic is here to offer you tooth root replacements.

overlay.title: Inlay/Onlay
overlay.description: Is your tooth suffering from decay, but does not necessarily need a crown? Perhaps all you need are indirect fillings, such as inlays and onlays. Schedule an appointment with us and we'll see how we could treat your tooth.

periodontics.title: Periodontics
periodontics.description: For those with more serious dental conditions such as gum bleeding and gingivitis, our experienced professionals are here to help you. Schedule an appointment with one of our dentists and we'll see the best way we could address your problem.

oralsurgery.title: Oral Surgery
oralsurgery.description: From tooth extraction to jaw surgery, Arevalo Clinic offers you the best of our dental surgical facilities and services.

dentures.title: Dentures
dentures.description: Has a tooth been lost, or your teeth been removed? Visit us and we'll customize dentures for you.

aesthetic.title: Aesthetic Dentistry
aesthetic.description: Enhance your smile with our premium aesthetic dentistry services. From smile makeovers to cosmetic contouring, we create natural, beautiful results tailored for our Saudi clients.

pediatric.title: Pediatric Dentistry
pediatric.description: We provide specialized dental care for children in a comfortable, friendly environment. Our pediatric services are perfect for families traveling together for dental treatment.

doctors.title: Meet Our Team
doctors.subtitle: Our team of experienced dentists is dedicated to providing you with the highest quality of dental care in Makati.

doctor1.name: Dr. Daisy Miranda-Arevalo
doctor1.bio: Dr. Daisy Miranda-Arevalo has had over 30 years of dental practice. Dr. Arevalo stands at the forefront in offering quality dental services from the heart of Makati's Central Business District.

doctor2.name: Dr. Caroline Verceles-Arevalo
doctor2.bio: Dr. Caroline specializes in orthodontics and aesthetic dentistry, providing patients with expert care for teeth alignment and cosmetic procedures. With her gentle approach and attention to detail, she ensures each patient achieves their ideal smile.

doctor3.name: Dr. Eloisa Tiongson
doctor3.bio: Dr. Eloisa is an expert in root canal therapy and endodontic procedures. Her precision and care in treating dental pulp issues have earned her a reputation for pain-free treatments and successful outcomes for even the most complex cases.

testimonials.subtitle: What our patients say about their experience with Arevalo Dental Clinic.

appointment.question: How do I schedule a dental appointment?
appointment.answer: You can schedule an appointment through our online booking system, by calling our clinic at +63 2 8123 4567, or by visiting Arevalo Dental Clinic in person. For new patients, we recommend calling to ensure we have all the necessary information to provide you with the best dental care.

insurance.question: What dental insurance plans do you accept?
insurance.answer: We accept most major dental insurance plans, both local and international. For our Arab Gulf patients, we work with multiple international insurers. Please contact our billing department or check our website for a complete list of accepted insurance providers. We recommend verifying your coverage before your appointment.

firstVisit.question: What should I bring to my first dental appointment?
firstVisit.answer: For your first visit, please bring your identification (passport for international patients), insurance information, a list of any medications you're currently taking, and any relevant previous dental records or X-rays. Arriving 15 minutes early to complete registration forms is also recommended.

emergency.question: Do you offer emergency dental services?
emergency.answer: Yes, we provide emergency dental care during our business hours. If you're experiencing severe dental pain, broken teeth, or other dental emergencies, please call us immediately at +63 2 8123 4567. We reserve time slots each day for emergency appointments.

prescription.question: Can international patients get follow-up care in their home country?
prescription.answer: Yes, we coordinate with dental professionals in Saudi Arabia and other Gulf countries to ensure continuity of care for our international patients. We provide detailed treatment records and can communicate directly with your local dentist to ensure proper follow-up care.
